title: Enhancing Language Application Skills for Adult Learners Through [K-12] Film-Based Assignments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational counseling psychology theories and expertise in language education
context.additional_context: An advanced course for corporate language education managers focusing on strengthening the linkage between theory and practice through film analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain the cultural context of linguistic expressions through analyzing dialogues in films.
Learners can present three or more language strategies tailored to their specialized field using cases extracted from films.
Learners can revise and improve learning content based on peer feedback in film-based discussions.

resources: Digital collaboration platforms (Notion, Google Docs, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
